content: slip_stitch ll oo uu cc hh yy bb uu bb bb ll ee slip_stitch by tshep cute & cabled hat to match the dainty bubbles mittens or to wear solo materials madelinetosh heritage erin ~ 220 yards 200m  blocked gauge 4 5 stitches per inch on sz 8 us size 8 us 5mm circulars or dpns cable needle tapestry needle & stitch marker directions note instructions between asterisks * are repeated to end of round brim  cast on 90 sts place marker and join in the round  work k2 p1 ribbing for 18 rounds or about 2 5 inches  increase row * k2 m1l p1 twice k2 p1 k2 m1l p1 twice* = 114 sts cable pattern row 1 * k2 p2 twice k2 p1 k2 p2 twice* row 2 * k2 p2 twice sl next 3 sts to cable needle and hold in back k2 sl the purl st from cable needle back to left-hand needle and purl it then k2 from cable needle p2 k2 p2* row 3 repeat row 1 row 4 *k2 p2 fc bc p1 fc bc p2* row 5 *k2 p3 k4 p3 k4 p3* row 6 *k2 p3 sl next 2sts to cable needle and hold in back k2 then k2 from cable needle p3 sl next 2sts to cable needle and hold in front k2 then k2 from cable needle p3* row 7 repeat row 5 row 8 *k2 p2 bc fc p1 bc fc p2* row 9 repeat row 1 row 10 * k2 p2 twice sl next 3 sts to cable needle and hold in front k2 sl the purl st from cable needle back to left-hand needle and purl it then k2 from cable needle p2 k2 p2* row 11-16 repeat row 3-8  repeat row 1-16 twice more decreases row 1 * k2 p2tog twice k2 p1 k2 p2tog twice* = 90 sts row 2 *k2 p1 fc sl next 3 sts to cable needle and hold in back k2 sl the purl st from cable needle back to left-hand needle and purl it then k2 from cable needle bc p1* row 3 *k2 p2tog k1 k2tog k1 p1 k1 k2tog k1 p2tog* = 66 sts row 4 *k2 p1 k3 p1 twice* row 5 *k2tog p1 k1 k2tog p1 twice* = 48 sts row 6 *k1 p1 k2 p1 twice* row 7 *k1 p1 k2tog p1 twice* = 36sts row 8 *k1 p1* row 9 k2tog around = 18 sts row 10 k2tog around = 9 sts  break yarn thread tail through the remaining 9 sts to pull them inward  weave in all yarn tails wet block for maximum slouch factor and enjoy abbreviations st s stitch es p purl sl slip_stitch purlwise onto left needle k2tog knit 2 sts together k knit p2tog purl two sts together m1l make one left with left needle pick up the bar between the two sts from the front knit into it through the
